Articles.Content: Probably a bit of a silly question, but I was wondering if there were any mods with that kind of 1950's, atomic everything, flying cars on mars within 10 years kind of feel (if that made any sense whatsoever), kind of like the atmosphere in the fallout games.
You could make them yourself! Cmon, this is KSP!

For nuclear rocket engines, check out Atomic Age by Porkjet

For nuclear reactors, check out Near Future Electrical by Nertea 

For flying cars, well, that's just Tuesday here on kerbin
Slap some jet engines on a rover. That might work.
